revised_title: Frits Zernike's Contributions to Optics: Phase Contrast and Complex Coefficient of Partial Coherence
tldr: Frits Zernike was a Dutch physicist known for his significant contributions to optics, particularly the development of the phase-contrast technique and the concept of the complex coefficient of partial coherence in light waves. His work has had a major impact on microscopy, especially in biological and medical sciences.
